game.name: Limbus Company
game.shortDescription: 림버스 컴퍼니의 관리자가 되어 12명의 수감자를 이끌고, 폐쇄된 로보토미 코퍼레이션 지부로 들어가 황금가지를 탈환하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: As the Executive Manager of Limbus Company, lead your group of twelve Sinners, venture into the buried facilities of Lobotomy Corporation, and lay claim on the Golden Boughs.

reviewHighlights.text: Undoubtedly a masterpiece, but one with a noticeable barrier of entry. After a 1000 hours on Limbus, I wholeheartedly recommend the game as a game, as...
